title: Review Board Meeting Minutes
description: As part of planning, an auditor reviews the minutes of Board of Directors meetings to identify strategic risks.

tasks.description: Obtain the approved minutes for all Board of Directors meetings for the past year.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the meeting minutes.

tasks.description: Review the minutes to identify key strategic initiatives, major decisions, and any significant risks or concerns discussed by the board.
tasks.expected_outcome: The review highlights a board-level concern about cybersecurity risks from a new international expansion.

tasks.description: Use this information to propose a new, high-priority audit of the international expansion's cybersecurity readiness to the CAE.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor uses the board-level information to make a timely and relevant audit proposal.
